Name: pilot_leithania
Description: Leithania is a country located between Kazimierz, Siracusa, Victoria, and Ursus, and is made up of numerous semi-independent nomadic cities. Leithania is known for their advanced Originium Arts applications where most, if not all, Leithaniens are mandated to be able to use Arts, as well as the extensive use of Arts-based technologies, one of which includes L-44 "Gramophones".
